headline: GTA Online
subtitle: On The Diamond Casino Podium: The Pfister Comet Safari
content:
Gently park your car on top of the valet outside of The Diamond Casino & Resort and make your way to the Lucky Wheel in the lobby to spin and potentially win the camouflaged Pfister Comet Safari whirling atop the podium, beckoning to be taken off the beaten path and go mud-running in the hills of Blaine County.

If you win the top prize, your Podium Vehicle will be delivered to your selected Garage.
